description:
Hello, I am John Colley and welcome to my Course. I am really looking forward to working with you.

Are you looking for an additional income source?

Are you a Freelancer looking for a new great market place full of Buyers?

Are you a Udemy instructor looking for more students who want to pay to enrol in your Course?

Then look no further - Fiverr Success is for you!

Discover how I started as a complete Newbie made Level 1 Seller while I made the course Everything I have learned, I share openly with you so you can replicate my Success - Fast and Easy!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

"John is one of my favorite instructors

I have taken over 100 Udemy courses and John's style is always clear, precise and thorough. Another great job - keep it up!" Alex G Five Stars

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

In this Course you will discover:

  • How to set up an Optimised Account and Profile on Fiverr
  • How to Select the Gigs that you can sell to willing and eager Buyers
  • How to Create a Gig from scratch - step by step
  • How to make amazing Videos which will help you increase your sales
  • How to manage your Fiverr Account day by day to maximise sales and your Fiverr reputation
  • How to promote your Fiverr Gigs both on and off Fiverr

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

"Neat and Professional

I'm delighted that I have decided to take this course on Fiverr. It's caen, coherent, it has a fast transfer of knowledge and it managed to raise my motivation into using Fiverr. I've seen the advantages, the mechanics and Fiverr dynamics through this whole course. Thank you, John!" Alina T. Five Stars

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

This Course has every thing you need and, naturally, comes with my 100% No QUIBBLE Money back Guarantee - well its Udemy's too! So, what are you waiting for?

Time is literally money! Enrol today and start your profitable Fiverr business with me!

Best regards

John Colley, The Six Minute Strategist

Business Strategist, Online Course Expert and Founder and Host of the Online Learning Podcast
title: Beginner's Step-by-Step Tutorial to Profitability on Fiverr
